page.title: 06RECREATION IN HINXWORTH
page.content: KEEP FIT - This is a weekly one hour session in the village hall run by a local lady. About a dozen women of differing ages work out with dance and stretching movements to popular music. Most people know each other so the atmosphere is often light hearted and even hilarious with everyone working hard but at their own pace and hopefully becoming more supple in the process! THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE - 40 ladies of Hinxworth and Edworth belong to the W.I. We meet monthly in the village hall to discuss W.I. matters, listen to a speaker on anything from cookery to self-defence, and end with tea and cakes. The W.I. offers friendship, relaxation and entertainment. We hold coffee mornings, jumble sales and even go carol singing for charity.
